title: Dinnerbone: 目前的工作进度
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
Dinnerbone: So happy to be back home. Lots of work to be done, gotta finish inventory rewrite and then will focus on some survivally things soon after!
Dinnerbone: 回到家太高兴了。还有一大堆事要做，（我们）要完成背包系统重写，然后会主要弄一些关于生存的事！


DB这边好像没什么进展，坐等下一个快照

replies.author: JUNS
replies.txt_content: - -！~突然觉得会英语能翻墙比会像素过得滋润- -！~
